name: Froggy Pond
description:
Created following Team Treehouse's GameDev course. Using this to showcase to my students how to create and upload games to Itch.io. A simple game where you try and collect as many flies as possible while avoiding the bird.

The primary things I learned in the creation of this game include:

  • Put together various pieces of art, animation, particle systems, sounds, music, and more into a cohesive game.
